Subject: Fighting for a Head

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement/Teufel/Scatterblaster/Nemesis Enforcer:





"We'll save you!" Nemesis yelled, tackling Vehement in mid air with little 
effect.  The behemoth of a robot was able to maintain his same position, 
bring a powerful fist to slam into Nemesis' right temple.

"Slagger!" he yelled, shoving his rifle into Vehement's gut and firing off 
ten rapid laser bolts.

Scatterblaster meanwhile flew over to "Zardus".  "Come on, Emperor, we must 
flee to the Lollipop Guild."

"Ja." Teufel replied, holograms making him look like Zardus.  A shoulder 
cannon extended, firing off two shots and sending Scatterblaster soaring 
backwards several feet in the air.
